approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that the spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

balanceOf.description: Returns the amount of tokens owned by the account.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance granted to a spender.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance granted to a spender.

getStETHByWstETH.description: Converts wstETH amount to stETH amount.

getWstETHByStETH.description: Converts stETH amount to wstETH amount.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

nonces.description: Returns the current nonce for the given address.

permit.description: Sets approval for a spender via signature.

stETH.description: Returns the address of the stETH contract.

stEthPerToken.description: Returns the amount of stETH per token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

tokensPerStEth.description: Returns the amount of tokens per stETH.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.
